name: StyleUp
headline: StyleUp brings effortless joy to getting dressed with daily,â¦
description:
StyleUp brings effortless joy to getting dressed with daily, weather-appropriate advice tailored to suit your life and style. It's your shortcut to chic.

We believe in discovery. It's our job to find outfit recommendations you love and deliver them to you conveniently and beautifully. Your feedback helps us make better recommendations, so we can serve you better every single day.

founders.name: Ryan Choi
founders.description:
7th eng at Salesforce, Director of Engineering at Zuora, Founder at StyleUp (YC W13), Partnerships at Twitter and PM at Lyft.

Now working on the YC software team, where it's been 5 years and maybe the best place I've ever worked. Who wants to join?

generated_description:
**StyleUp: Your Fashion Companion**

Founded in 2012 and hailing from the vibrant city of New York, StyleUp sprung into life during the Y Combinator W13 batch. The company’s mission revolves around simplifying the age-old dilemma of "What should I wear today?" by providing users with effortless and stylish outfit recommendations that take into account daily weather and personal preferences. With the belief that discovery is key, StyleUp prides itself on curating an array of outfit suggestions that resonate with your unique style. They actively seek user feedback to refine their recommendations, ensuring better service with each interaction.

Currently, StyleUp is a lean operation, running with a tight-knit team of two. The company's unique angle is not just in fashion advice but also extends to a well-structured platform where users can explore tattoo ideas. StyleUp has positioned itself as a go-to resource for tattoo enthusiasts too, offering extensive categories from animals to anime, tribal designs, and everything in between. Whether you're seeking inspiration for a new tattoo or simply want to elevate your wardrobe, StyleUp has become the internet’s favorite spot.

If you’re interested in their offerings, you can dive deeper into the world of StyleUp at [thestyleup.com](http://thestyleup.com). Plus, if you want to keep your finger on the fashion pulse (or tattoo trends), follow them on social media to stay updated.

In essence, StyleUp isn't just about clothing or body art—it's about making stylistic expression accessible and enjoyable. So next time you're staring at a wardrobe full of clothes but feel like you've got nothing to wear, just remember, a little advice from StyleUp might just do the trick.
